# Coiling Around

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Taijutsu
- Class: Offensive
- Range: Short
- Users: Aoda, Manda, Manda II, Garaga~anime
- Media: Anime, Manga, Game

## Summary
Giant snakes can coil around their prey and strangle it, no matter how big it is. * Technically, all snakes of the RyÅ«chi Cave are able to use this technique.
